languages.text: "Вы, небось, кривотолков черни наслушались, Звездное Сиятельство? Мало ли куда чернь потом разбегается? Но смею вас заверить, что победители зачастую отправляются лично ко мне на службу. Мы зовем это Высшей Милостью, и сегодня выбор кому ее даровать будет за вами!"

"Your Celestial Highness must have been listening to a lot of gossip. Who cares where the rabble goes afterward? However, I can assure you that the victors are often sent into my personal service. We call it the Highest Favour, and today, it will be up to you to choose whom it should be bestowed upon!"
languages.original_text: "Вы, небось, кривотолков черни наслушались, Звездное Сиятельство? Мало ли куда чернь потом разбегается? Но смею вас заверить, что победители зачастую отправляются лично ко мне на службу. Мы зовем это Высшей Милостью, и сегодня выбор кому ее даровать будет за вами!"

traits.locale_text: "You must have been listening to a lot of gossip, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}? Who cares where the rabble goes afterward? But I can assure you that the victors are often sent to my personal service. We call it the High Favour, and today it will be up to you to choose who to bestow it upon!"

"You must have been listening to a lot of gossip, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}? Who cares where the rabble goes afterward? But I can assure you that the victors are often sent to my personal service. We call it the High Favour, and today it will be up to you to choose who to bestow it upon!"

"You must have been listening to a lot of gossip, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Who cares where the rabble goes afterward? However, I can assure you that the victors are often sent into my personal service. We call it the High Favour, and today, it will be up to you to choose whom it should be bestowed upon!"

"You must have been listening to a lot of gossip, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Who cares where the rabble goes afterward? However, I can assure you that the victors are often sent into my personal service. We call it the High Favour, and today, it will be up to you to choose whom it should be bestowed upon!"

"Your Celestial Highness must have been listening to a lot of gossip. Who cares where the rabble goes afterward? However, I can assure you that the victors are often sent into my personal service. We call it the Highest Favour, and today, it will be up to you to choose whom it should be bestowed upon!"

"Your Celestial Highness must have been listening to a lot of gossip. Who cares where the rabble goes afterward? However, I can assure you that the victors are often sent into my personal service. We call it the Highest Favour, and today, it will be up to you to choose whom it should be bestowed upon!"

languages.text: “来自上界的大人，您肯定是听说了许多流言蜚语。那些不值一提的底层人后来去了哪里，又有谁在乎呢？不过，我可以向您保证，那些胜利者通常会亲自为我服务，我们称之为‘至高无上的青睐’。而今天，将由您亲自决定将这份青睐赐予谁！”
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness must have been listening to a lot of gossip. Who cares where the rabble goes afterward? However, I can assure you that the victors are often sent into my personal service. We call it the Highest Favour, and today, it will be up to you to choose whom it should be bestowed upon!"

traits.locale_text: “来自上界的大人，您肯定是听说了许多流言蜚语。那些不值一提的底层人后来去了哪里，又有谁在乎呢？不过，我可以向您保证，那些胜利者通常会亲自为我服务，我们称之为‘至高无上的青睐’。而今天，将由您亲自决定将这份青睐赐予谁！”

languages.text: «Su Excelencia Celestial debe de haber prestado demasiada atención a los rumores locales. ¿A quién le importa dónde va la plebe después? Eso sí, le garantizo que los vencedores suelen incorporarse a mi séquito personal. Lo llamamos el Favor Supremo, ¡y en el día de hoy le corresponderá a usted decidir quién recibe tamaño honor!».
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness must have been listening to a lot of gossip. Who cares where the rabble goes afterward? However, I can assure you that the victors are often sent into my personal service. We call it the Highest Favour, and today, it will be up to you to choose whom it should be bestowed upon!"

traits.locale_text: «Su Excelencia Celestial debe de haber prestado demasiada atención a los rumores locales. ¿A quién le importa dónde va la plebe después? Eso sí, le garantizo que los vencedores suelen incorporarse a mi séquito personal. Lo llamamos el Favor Supremo, ¡y en el día de hoy le corresponderá a usted decidir quién recibe tamaño honor!».

languages.text: "Sanırım Semavi Efendimizin kulağına epey bir dedikodu gitmiş. Ayaktakımının başına daha sonra ne geldiği kimin umurunda? Ancak galiplerin genellikle kişisel hizmetime gönderildiğinden sizi temin ederim. Buna Yüce Lütuf diyoruz. Bunun bugün kime bahşedileceğine siz karar vereceksiniz!"
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness must have been listening to a lot of gossip. Who cares where the rabble goes afterward? However, I can assure you that the victors are often sent into my personal service. We call it the Highest Favour, and today, it will be up to you to choose whom it should be bestowed upon!"

traits.locale_text: "Sanırım Semavi Efendimizin kulağına epey bir dedikodu gitmiş. Ayaktakımının başına daha sonra ne geldiği kimin umurunda? Ancak galiplerin genellikle kişisel hizmetime gönderildiğinden sizi temin ederim. Buna Yüce Lütuf diyoruz. Bunun bugün kime bahşedileceğine siz karar vereceksiniz!"

languages.text: 「天の閣下はたくさんの噂話を聞いているに違いありません。庶民がどこへ行こうと誰が気にするものですか？しかし、あなたに保証できるのは、勝者は個人的なサービスに送られることが多いということですね。私たちはそれを『最高の恩恵』と呼びます。今日は、誰に名誉を与えるかはあなた次第です！」
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness must have been listening to a lot of gossip. Who cares where the rabble goes afterward? However, I can assure you that the victors are often sent into my personal service. We call it the Highest Favour, and today, it will be up to you to choose whom it should be bestowed upon!"

traits.locale_text: 「天の閣下はたくさんの噂話を聞いているに違いありません。庶民がどこへ行こうと誰が気にするものですか？しかし、あなたに保証できるのは、勝者は個人的なサービスに送られることが多いということですね。私たちはそれを『最高の恩恵』と呼びます。今日は、誰に名誉を与えるかはあなた次第です！」

languages.text: « Il semblerait que bien des ragots soient parvenus jusqu'aux oreilles de Votre Altesse Célestissime... Pourquoi vous en soucier ? Je peux tout de même vous assurer que les vainqueurs sont souvent intégrés à mon service personnel. Nous appelons cela la Faveur Ultime. Aujourd'hui, il vous incombera de choisir qui recevra cet insigne honneur ! »
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness must have been listening to a lot of gossip. Who cares where the rabble goes afterward? However, I can assure you that the victors are often sent into my personal service. We call it the Highest Favour, and today, it will be up to you to choose whom it should be bestowed upon!"

traits.locale_text: « Il semblerait que bien des ragots soient parvenus jusqu'aux oreilles de Votre Altesse Célestissime... Pourquoi vous en soucier ? Je peux tout de même vous assurer que les vainqueurs sont souvent intégrés à mon service personnel. Nous appelons cela la Faveur Ultime. Aujourd'hui, il vous incombera de choisir qui recevra cet insigne honneur ! »

languages.text: "Eure himmlische Hoheit hat wohl zu viel Tratsch gehört. Wen schert es, wohin der Pöbel anschließend geht? Ich kann Euch jedoch versichern, dass die Sieger oft in meinen persönlichen Dienst eintreten. Wir nennen es die Höchste Gunst, und heute dürft Ihr entscheiden, wem diese gewährt wird!"
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness must have been listening to a lot of gossip. Who cares where the rabble goes afterward? However, I can assure you that the victors are often sent into my personal service. We call it the Highest Favour, and today, it will be up to you to choose whom it should be bestowed upon!"

Ich kann Euch jedoch versichern, dass die Sieger oft in meinen persönlichen Dienst eintreten. Wir nennen es die Höchste Gunst, und heute dürft Ihr entscheiden, wem diese gewährt wird!"
